cmd_utilities

A set of possible useful functions for cmd.

Author: Guilherme Arruda

GitHub: https://​github​.com​/ohananoshi

Included Libraries

  • stdbool.h

  • windows.h

  • wincon.h

Types
border_shape

Set of characters to construct boxes

colors

Set of standard colors for cmd.

Functions
set_to_fullscreen
bool set_to_fullscreen()

Display the console in fullscreen mode.

set_text_color
void set_text_color(
unsigned short int color
)

Change the color of the text (see color_scheme)

color_scheme

To set a background color to selected foreground color,

just add the background color multiplied by 16 (see example1)

example1
Parameters
color
unsigned short int

decimal value of color (8bit).

move_cursor
void move_cursor(
unsigned short int x,
unsigned short int y
)

Moves the console cursor for the specified position in coluns and lines.

write_text
void write_text(
char *text,
short int x,
short int y
)

Write a text in defined position.

draw_box
void draw_box(
border_shape *ascii_dec_symbols,
short int width,
short int height,
short int *pos
)

Draw a empty static box with some properties using characters ASCII.

Parameters
ascii_dec_symbols
border_shape*

Pointer with a set of characters necessaries for the construction of box.

pos
short int*

Position of box relative Left high corner of console

fill_rectangle
void fill_rectangle(
short int ascii_dec_character,
short int width,
short int height
)

Print a fill rectangle with size of parameters.

Parameters
ascii_dec_character
short int

decimal value os asacii character

width
short int

width of rectangle

height
short int

height of rectangle
